mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_applications (user_id, status, reason, feedback, processor_id, created_at, processed_at) VALUES (#{applicantId}, #{status}, #{reason}, #{feedback}, #{processorId}, #{createdAt}, #{processedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM admin_applications WHERE user_id = #{applicantId} AND status = 'PENDING'

SELECT aa.id, aa.user_id, aa.status, aa.reason, aa.feedback, aa.processor_id, aa.created_at, aa.processed_at, u.username AS applicant_username, p.username AS processor_username FROM admin_applications aa JOIN users u ON aa.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN users p ON aa.processor_id = p.id WHERE aa.id = #{id}

SELECT aa.id, aa.user_id, aa.status, aa.reason, aa.feedback, aa.processor_id, aa.created_at, aa.processed_at, u.username AS applicant_username, p.username AS processor_username FROM admin_applications aa JOIN users u ON aa.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN users p ON aa.processor_id = p.id WHERE aa.status = 'PENDING' LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admin_applications WHERE status = 'PENDING'

SELECT aa.id, aa.user_id, aa.status, aa.reason, aa.feedback, aa.processor_id, aa.created_at, aa.processed_at, u.username AS applicant_username, p.username AS processor_username FROM admin_applications aa JOIN users u ON aa.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN users p ON aa.processor_id = p.id WHERE aa.user_id = #{applicantId} ORDER BY aa.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
